1.title: Happy
1.plot: Everyone has FEELINGS - both good and bad. Sometimes we feel happy. Sometimes we feel sad. And sometimes we feel something in between. The Feels, is about all the emotions we feel and how different people might feel those emotions. Today's emotion is HAPPY.

2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Children can feel angry, jealous, excited, sad, silly, frustrated, happy and worried. Often times, young children lack the language skills to express their feelings. Created and developed with the assistance of a Family Therapist, The Feels, is an original series created to give children the tools to better identify and express their emotions; thus leading them into a life of good citizenship. Simultaneously, The Feels provides parents a visual communication tool to help strengthen the emotional intelligence between and within their children.
imdb.title: The Feels
plot: Children can feel angry, jealous, excited, sad, silly, frustrated, happy and worried. Often times, young children lack the language skills to express their feelings. Created and developed with the assistance of a Family Therapist, _The Feels_ (qv), is an original series created to give children the tools to better identify and express their emotions; thus leading them into a life of good citizenship. Simultaneously, _The Feels_ (qv) provides parents a visual communication tool to help strengthen the emotional intelligence between and within their children.::StarKon
